engine.rendering

Class RenderContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.rendering.Bitmap
      • engine.rendering.RenderContext

  • public class RenderContext
extends Bitmap
    Represents a renderable location, including relevant rendering functions.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int TRANSPARENCY_BASIC
      The transparency type to be used when some pixels should be transparent, but no color blending is desired.
      static int TRANSPARENCY_FULL
      The transparency type to be used when pixel color blending based on based on alpha value is desired.
      static int TRANSPARENCY_NONE
      The transparency type to be used when no transparency is desired.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      RenderContext(int width, int height)
      Creates a new render target.

        public static final int TRANSPARENCY_NONE
        The transparency type to be used when no transparency is desired.

        Should be referred to by name rather than value, as value may change.

        See Also:

      • RenderContext

        public RenderContext(int width,
             int height)
        Creates a new render target.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the render target.
        height - The height of the render target.

    • Method Detail

      • drawString

        public void drawString(java.lang.String text,
              float x,
              float y,
              float size,
              byte b,
              byte g,
              byte r)
        Draws a string of text to the screen starting at the location specified by (x,y), in the color specified by (b, g, r).
        Parameters:
        text - The string of text to draw
        x - The location text drawing should start at on X, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        y - The location text drawing should start at on Y, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        size - How big the font should be, where 1 unit is the screen height.
        b - The blue value of the desired font color.
        g - The green value of the desired font color.
        r - The red value of the desired font color.

      • setCameraPosition

        public void setCameraPosition(float x,
                     float y)
        Moves the rendering camera to location (x, y)
        Parameters:
        x - The X location of the camera, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        y - The Y location of the camera, normalized into the range (-1, 1)

      • getRenderArea

        public AABB getRenderArea()
        Creates an AABB covering the entire renderable area.
        Returns:
        An AABB covering the entire renderable area.

      • drawImage

        public void drawImage(Bitmap bitmap,
             float startX,
             float startY,
             float endX,
             float endY,
             int transparencyType)
        Draws an image starting at location (startX, startY) and ending at (endX, endY), resizing as necessary.

        The image is not drawn to scale. It is resized to fit in the range (startX, endX) on X, and (startY, endY) on Y. This way, all image drawing is resolution independent.

        Parameters:
        bitmap - The bitmap to draw
        startX - The start location on X, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        startY - The start location on Y, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        endX - The end location on X, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        endY - The end location on Y, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        transparencyType - The type of transparency to be used. Should be one of the RenderContext.TRANSPARENCY_ types.
